title: They ban my account How to recover?
body: i tried to message your support to change my old email account because i forgot it , and now after getting ban i remember my old email and password  how to recover my account

replies.body:
Account recoveries can be requested by [submitting a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with our account specialists. 

Select the category **I need help recovering my account** and fill out as much information as you remember. It may be a few days before someone gets back to you since recoveries require a fair amount of research, so I recommend being patient while we get to you.

Let me know if you have any questions.
